name: Long Roof Canyon
description:
A long hike leads to a single two stage fluted rappel immediately to reaching Wet Beaver Creek.

Approach

Descent

A long hike with easy downclimbing leads to a single two stage 100 foot rappel off of a tree.

Exit

After the final rappel turn canyon right. Hike up into the inside corner and climb 4th and easy 5th class about 30 feet (non exposed) to access the bench above. Follow bench to top of the two stage rappel. Return back up drainage.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

Explored solo by Garrett in October of 2023. Possibly explored prior.
